summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6202 for the improvement of 4th Avenue South from Michigan Street to Fidalgo Street; and a certain other street; by sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 88258, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
